Policies: Cancellation Policy - Booking Amount Should Be At Least 20% At The Time Of Booking Which Is Not Refundable In Case The Order Is Rescheduled, Postponed, Or Cancelled From The Client’s Side. 30% Of Total Amount Should Be Paid Before 30days Of The Starting Of Programme. 40% Of The Total Amount Should Be Paid At The End Of The Event. Due 10% Amount Must Be Paid At The Time Of Printing Of Album
